airplane.description:
Buckle up!

Lucie is at the wheel; Felix is the passenger; and the luggage goes on the green foam mattress. Destination? The airport!
airplane.title: Airplane

blues1.description:
A clue! A clue!

You'll have to watch the TV show Blue's Clues to understand Felix's excitement at finding blue pawprints. Lucie made them out of blue masking tape.
blues1.title: Blues 1

blues2.description: When you find a clue, you sit down in your thinking chair, and you write it down in your handy dandy notebook.
blues2.title: Blues 2

dylan1.description: On Saturday, we went to Dylan's 3 year old birthday party. We had a blast! There was a marionnette show, a piñata, and a big cake with Caillou on it.
dylan1.title: Dylan 1

dylan2.description: Felix patiently waits for his piece of cake. He especially enjoyed wearing his official party hat.
dylan2.title: Dylan 2

dylan3.description: Among the many birthday activities, Felix's favorite was circle time by one of Dylan's preschool teacher, who came with his guitar to entertain guests big and small.
dylan3.title: Dylan 3

jump1.description: Most parents discourage their kids from jumping on the furniture; but we think it's healthy exercice.
jump1.title: Jump 1

letter1.description: Felix is fascinated with the concept of sending and receiving mail. He likes to "draw lettre" to his friends and family. Sometimes, baby elephant helps.
letter1.title: Letter 1

letter2.description:
Felix isn't too good with scissors yet, but he likes the idea.

Don't worry, those are all-plastic cut-nothing-but-paper toddler scissors.
letter2.title: Letter 2

letter3.description: A little glue stick - et voilà - another masterpiece ready to put in an envelope.
letter3.title: Letter 3

painting.description: No room is safe from Dean's painting fervor. The house is looking good!
painting.title: Painting

snuggery.description: Felix's preschool, The Snuggery, organized a potluck at our local park, complete with an exhibit of artwork from the talented student body.
snuggery.title: Snuggery

description: Summer is here! That means it's time to get seriously ready for that new baby. Lucie is packing the hospital bag, while Dean puts on the last coat of paint in the little one's bedroom.
title: June 28
